sentences.sContent: This article observes that imposture in Copyright Law is the infringement of the right of signature of authors.
sentences.sContent_eng: This article observes that imposture in Copyright Law is the infringement of the right of signature of authors.
sentences.sCn: 对争议中的冒名行为，笔者认为乃是属于侵害作者署名权的行为。

remMethod.val: im(进入) + pos(放) + ture → 把别的东西放进去 → 冒充

words.tran: 征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担
欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于

trans.tranOther: the act or an instance of deceiving others, esp by assuming a false identity
